original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 13.2. Vedanāttika
analyzed: vedanā ttika

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
analyzed: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā—sukhāya vedanāya sampayutte khandhe paṭicca sukhavedanā cittasamuṭṭhānañca
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutte khandhe paṭicca sukha vedanā citta samuṭṭhānañca

original: rūpaṁ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe…. (Mahābhūtā natthi.) Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: rūpa paṭisandhi khaṇe pe mahābhūtā natthi sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhamma

original: paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā asukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… sukhāya
analyzed: sampayuttam ekam khandham paṭicca tayo khandhāḥ citta samuṭṭhānam ca rūpam pe sukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca na adukkhamasukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutta

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca

original: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya
analyzed: dhammāḥ uppajjanti hetu paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
analyzed: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca

original: naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Dukkhāya vedanāya
analyzed: na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā dukkhāya vedanāya

original: sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhamma

original: paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: vedanāya sampayutto ca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya
analyzed: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca na dukkhāya

original: vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: vedanāya sampayutto ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Adukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā adukkhamasukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: hetu paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Adukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā adukkhamasukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca na dukkhāya

original: vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutta

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca

original: naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa …pe… purejāte āsevane cuddasa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe ekavīsa pe purejāte āsevane cuddasa pe avigate ekavīsa

original: Paccanīya
analyzed: paccanīya

original: Nahetu
analyzed: na hetu

original: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati na hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuyā ekavīsa, naārammaṇe ekavīsa …pe… nakamme nava …pe… navippayutte cuddasa …pe… novigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: na hetuyā ekavīsa na ārammaṇe ekavīsa pe na kamme nava pe na vippayutte cuddasa pe no vigate ekavīsa

original: (Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṁsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi paccaya vārampi nissaya vārampi sa saṭṭha vārampi sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: 13.2.7. Pañhāvāra
analyzed: pañhāvāra

original: 13.2.7.1. Paccayānuloma
analyzed: paccaya anuloma

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
analyzed: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetu paccayena

original: paccayo. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa
analyzed: paccayaḥ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa

original: hetupaccayena paccayo. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: hetu paccayena paccayaḥ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
analyzed: sampayuttassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammo

original: nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca

original: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nadukkhāya vedanāya
analyzed: dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ na dukkhāya vedanāya

original: sampayuttassa ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena
analyzed: sampayuttassa ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetu paccayena

original: paccayo. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca nadukkhāya
analyzed: paccayaḥ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca na dukkhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca naadukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: dhammaḥ na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca na adukkhamasukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa. (Pañhāvāraṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa pañhā vāraṃ
